name: Burning Out (itch) (KroneDev)
description:
Controls: WASD (movement) / SPACE (jump) / LMB (Throw fire) / R (reset current stage) -- I haven't learnt much in the way of making a 'settings' menus, so there is currently no way to change the sensitivity. I will learn some of these soon.

This game was made for the One Game a Month jam (OGAM). I aimed small and that's what we got, but overall, it was fun to make and I find it quite fun to play. Only has a few short levels at this point, but if it magically gets a load of interest, I could attempt to add more levels.

Game itself: A few short levels, receive a score upon reaching the goal based on how much of your fire is still burning. Don't let your fire burn out :)
